prompt翻译: prompt: Traditional Chinese ink painting style, iron ore sleeps quietly in the mountains, surrounded by verdant mountains and gurgling water, the picture incorporates elements from ancient mythology, such as guardian beasts or immortals, the colors are mainly dark blue, dark green, dotted with gold and silver light, showing the mystery and preciousness of iron ore.
